title: C++ frontend: how to debug nan gradients
body_html:
Hi,
I am getting very large gradients and then, even with clamping, nan gradients (suddenly all of them). I am surprised because I am porting my working program from Python to C++ backends. How to debug this situation?
I can't see any register_backward_hook or similar function.

Thanks,
Slawek

body:
Hi,
I am getting very large gradients and then, even with clamping, nan gradients (suddenly all of them). I am surprised because I am porting my working program from Python to C++ backends. How to debug this situation?  
I can't see any register_backward_hook or similar function.

Thanks,
Slawek
